Boston.Avalon North Station: Avalon North Station is a 38-story, 415 feet (126 m) residential skyscraper currently in Boston, Massachusetts. Built adjacent to the North Station transportation hub, the luxury high-rise is one of the tallest buildings in Boston. The property contains 503 studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartments, along with 219 parking spaces, fewer than .5 per unit.
